medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one day prior with moderate to severe aching pain in the epigastrum. The pain was initially radiating to the back but is now non-radiating. The patient reports nausea since this morning without vomiting, and experienced loose stools since last night, including one dark brown tarry stool this morning.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthmatic bronchitis with URI, Anxiety, hyperlipidemia.
medical_history.family_history: Father has BPH. Mother has an intestinal problem (likely colitis). Maternal grandfather had diabetes mellitus, no other relevant history. No coronary artery disease or cancer noted.
medical_history.social_history: History of heavy alcohol use, typically 6 beers and 6 shots daily, with increased intake over the last week during the holidays.
